history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. qsimpl use: Rplus_le_reg_r. rewrite Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm b c). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm c d). qsimpl use: Rplus_le_reg_r,Rplus_assoc. qsimpl use: Rplus_le_reg_r,Rplus_le_compat_l,Rplus_assoc. qsimpl use: Rplus_le_reg_r,Rplus_le_compat_l,Rplus_assoc. srun best use: Rplus_le_compat.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 + r <= r2 + r -> r1 <= r2" on hypothesis of type "b <= c".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?M2061 + (?M2062 + ?M2063)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 + r2 + r3 = r1 + (r2 + r3) H0 : forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 + r <= r2 + r -> r1 <= r2 a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c <= d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "d" with "a + c".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H5 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 + r2 + r3 = r1 + (r2 + r3) H4 : forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r + r1 <= r + r2 H : forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 + r <= r2 + r -> r1 <= r2 a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c <= d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "b <= c" with "a + c + b <= d + c".

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Rplus_le_reg_r with (r:=c) in H2. rewrite Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm b c). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm c d). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. apply Rplus_le_compat_l. apply H2.
